title: How to copy a DVD of a DVD rip - Quora

response.answer_text: Be aware, breaking the DRM that makes DVDs uncopyable is a felony crime in most countries. You need a program that will do this criminal act. And then you need a program that takes the ISO and chapter files and burns them to a new disk. Or makes an AVI file to play on your computer. But seriously, don't break the law.
